attributes.action: Ban the Grand National and similar races.
attributes.background: Bring an end to the Grand National Horse race and others like it.. How many more of these beautiful animals have to die in the name of sport..  These races need to be banned immediately..  We need at least 10,000 signatures to get this petition looked at in Parliament, lets make it matter...

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like all forms of horse racing to be banned, or only certain kinds of racing. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
